Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 14 Parittārammaṇattika » 14.7 Pañhāvāra » 14.7.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 14.7.2.1 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Parittārammaṇattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
38.
2247Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, nasahajāte nava, naaññamaññe nava, nanissaye nava, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava…pe…  namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte nava, noatthiyā nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava, noavigate nava. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2248Paccanīyaṃ.
